Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback is {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

message_win.TRY:
THANKS FOR PLAYING!
YOU COULD HAVE WON

Game.page1:
Select 6 of 9 ‘?’ tiles to reveal symbols. 

Connect revealed symbols from left to right on the grid to win up to 2 corresponding prizes. 

Reveal lights to fill the multiplier and bonus meters to trigger the bonuses.
Game.page1Port:
Select 6 of 9 ‘?’ tiles to reveal symbols. 

Connect revealed symbols from left to right
 on the grid to win up to 2 corresponding prizes. 

Reveal lights to fill the multiplier
 and bonus meters to trigger the bonuses.
Game.page2:
Find a Purple Light to trigger the Prize Bonus.
Select dials to reveal prizes.
Reveal COLLECT to end the bonus and win all revealed prizes.
Game.page2Port:
Find a Purple Light to trigger the Prize Bonus.
Select dials to reveal prizes.
Reveal COLLECT to end the bonus
and win all revealed prizes.
Game.page3:
Find 3 Green Lights to trigger the Multiplier Bonus.

Select START to reveal a multiplier of 2x to 5x to apply to the total win.
Game.page3Port:
Find 3 Green Lights to trigger the Multiplier Bonus.

Select START to reveal a multiplier of
2x to 5x to apply to the total win.
Game.bonusInfo: FIND 3 OR MORE GOLD STARS TO WIN!
Game.multiplierInfo1:
Adds a multiplier to
your current winnings
Game.multiplierInfo1Port: Adds a multiplier to your current winnings
